alert.note: Alert for Carter; Fallon (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 7:22PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Fallon and northern Carter Counties through 815 PM MDT... At 721 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles northwest of Baker to 7 miles southwest of Ekalaka. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph, very heavy rain, and possibly pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Baker, Ekalaka, Plevna, Webster, Ollie, Medicine Rocks State Park, Westmore, Willard and Mill Iron. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
